name: Casper's Scare School: Spooky Sports Day
overview: Casper and his friends scare up some fun with spooky sports games the whole family can enjoy. Once a year, the Underworld celebrates sports day. It's a day when the grounds of Scare School are filled with all kinds of sporting events. Help Casper win gold medals and stop his pesky nemesis Thatch from hogging all the glory. Keep the ball off the ground in a game of Creepy Uppies, balance a giant dragon egg on a tiny spoon in the Dragon Egg and Spoon Race, and much more. Even though these events are fit for ghouls and ghosts, since Casper's involved, you know the competition is always friendly.
